Fine, but that was at night, what makes you say the weapons don't 
have solar panels hidden somewhere?  Besides I recall Sunhawk running 
out and changing clips at least once.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> They did run out of ammo in BW. The most notable occasion was in 
Coming of 
> the fuzors pt. 2 in which the Maximals all ran out of ammo against 
the 
> Predacons. And event hen they were shooting 40 blasts at a time, at 
the most 
> Rattrap fire 3 shots at a time and at the most dinobot fired 2 
blasts at a 
> time. This is a real simulated war and thus charachters would run 
out of 
> ammo, denying this fact makes no sense whatsoever. Its like 
fighting an army 
> with a six shooter and saying it has unlimited ammo.
